question: Which union ministry to host the 2nd Gateway of India Geo economic Dialogue-2017?
explanation: The Ministry of External Affairs (MEA) is co-hosting the Second Gateway of India Geo economic Dialogue with Gateway House in Mumbai, Maharashtra on February 13-14, 2017 . This is Indiaâ€™s premier geo-economics conference on the theme \'Where Geopolitics meets Business\' focused on building synergies between business and foreign policy. There will be panel discussions covering topics like Sovereign Funds, Global Taxation and Digital Economy.
